name: Entei
author: Ryo Ueda
flavor_text: It is said that when it roars, a volcano erupts somewhere around the globe.

poke_body.name: Burning Coat
poke_body.effect: Whenever 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon is Knocked Out by damage from Entei’s attacks, discard the top 3 cards from your opponent’s deck.

attacks.name: Blaze Roar
attacks.effect: Does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) Flip a coin. If tails, discard 2 {R} Energy attached to Entei.
